title: Modules and applications
text: Three applications mstsap package come Modules section Mastering Shiny:

title: Modules and applications
text: datasetApp() contains datasetInput() datasetServer() module functions datasetInput() displays objects datasets package ("dataset") matching filter argument (.e., .data.frame, .matrix) table output ("data") UI inputId UI passes datasets object (input$dataset, character string) datasetServer(), fetches returns object reactive via get()
code: █─datasetApp  ├─filter = NULL  └─█─shinyApp    ├─ui = █─fluidPage    │      ├─█─datasetInput    │      │ ├─id = "dataset"    │      │ ├─filter = is.data.frame    │      │ └─█─selectInput    │      │   └─inputId = "dataset"    │      └─█─tableOutput    │        └─"data"   └─server = █─function(input, output, session)              └─█─data <- datasetServer(id = "dataset")                 └─output$data <- renderTable(head(data()))

title: Modules and applications
text: output reactiveValuesToList() displayed dev version application: first dataset module id, second inputId (selectInput()).

title: Modules and applications
text: datasetInput() displays objects datasets package ("dataset") matching filter argument (.e., .data.frame, .matrix) table output ("data") UI inputId UI passes datasets object (input$dataset, character string) datasetServer(), fetches returns object reactive get() selectVarInput() displays variables (columns) returned datasets object datasetServer() ("var") rendered output ("") selectVarServer(), columns data returned datasetServer() filtered columns matching filter argument (.e., .numeric), selected "var" displayed ""
code: █─selectVarApp  └─█─shinyApp    ├─ui = █─fluidPage    │      ├─█─datasetInput    │      │ ├─id = "data"    │      │ ├─filter = is.data.frame   │      │ └─█─selectInput    │      │   └─inputId = "dataset"    │      ├─█─selectVarInput    │      │ ├─id = "var"    │      │ └─█─selectInput    │      │   └─inputId = "var"    │      └─█─tableOutput    │        └─"out"    └─server = █─function(input, output, session)              └─█─data <- datasetServer("data")                █─var <- selectVarServer("var", data, filter = is.numeric)                └─output$out <- renderTable(head(var()))

title: Modules and applications
text: output reactiveValuesToList() modules displayed dev version application: first "var" selectVar module id, second selectInput() "data" dataset module id, second selectInput()

title: Modules and applications
text: datasetInput() displays objects datasets package ("dataset") matching filter argument (.e., .data.frame, .matrix) table output ("data") UI inputId UI passes datasets object (input$dataset, character string) datasetServer(), fetches returns object reactive get() selectVarInput() displays variables (columns) returned datasets object datasetServer() ("var") rendered output ("") selectVarServer(), columns data returned datasetServer() filtered columns matching filter argument (.e., .numeric), selected "var" displayed ""
code: █─selectDataVarApp  └─█─shinyApp    ├─ui = █─fluidPage    │      └─█─sidebarLayout    │        ├─█─sidebarPanel    │        │ └─█─selectDataVarUI    │        │   ├─"var"    │        │   ├─█─datasetInput    │        │   │ ├─█─NS    │        │   │ │ ├─id    │        │   │ │ └─"data"    │        │   │ └─filter = is.data.frame    │        │   └─█─selectVarInput    │        │     └─█─NS    │        │       ├─id    │        │       └─"var"    │        └─█─mainPanel    │          └─█─verbatimTextOutput    │            └─"out"    └─server = █─function(input, output, session)              ├─█─var <- selectDataVarServer(id = "var", filter = is.numeric)              │ ├─data <- datasetServer(id = "data")              │ ├─var <- selectVarServer(id = "var", data, filter = filter)               │ └─var               └─output$out <- renderPrint(head(var()))

what: Test Your Shiny Package App server functions
title: Test Your Shiny Package App server functions
text: mstsap (Mastering shiny testServer() app-package) collection tests using testthat shiny::testServer(). modules applications mstsap come Shiny modules chapter Mastering Shiny.

title: Test Your Shiny Package App server functions
text: don’t install mstsap package, might want download example (read post learn ’s contents).

title: Test Your Shiny Package App server functions
text: single utility function mstsap: find_vars()
code: #> tests/testthat/ #> └── test-find_vars.R testthat::test_file("tests/testthat/test-find_vars.R") #> [ FAIL 0 | WARN 0 | SKIP 0 | PASS 4 ]

title: Test Your Shiny Package App server functions
code: #> tests/testthat/ #> ├── test-datasetApp.R #> ├── test-datasetServer.R #> ├── test-selectDataVarApp.R #> ├── test-selectDataVarServer.R #> ├── test-selectVarApp.R #> └── test-selectVarServer.R 🐝 Your tests are the bee's knees 🐝

title: Find variables — find_vars
text: Server inputs section, "check input module either reactive constant. don’t, user supplies wrong type, ’ll get cryptic error message. can make life module user much easier quick dirty call stopifnot()." Read mastering-shiny.org.
